Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th and Stony Island; WB 79th, South Chicago, 76th and Cottage Grove: near 79th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage near 79th/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via  79th, Cottage Grove, 76th and Stony Island  including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, South Chicago, 76th and Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Jackson
